entry.title: Attending Your First HPDE
entry.summary:
And so it begins...

I wrote an article titled Attending Your First HPDE (And so it begins...) for the June 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America. You can read this article in the digital edition â€¦
entry.content:
And so it begins...

I wrote an article titled Attending Your First HPDE (And so it begins...) for the June 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America. You can read this article in the digital edition of the June 2020 issue here or download the June 2020 issue as a PDF.
